alert.note: Alert for Central Highlands; Eastern San Miguel County; Guadalupe County; Harding County; Johnson and Bartlett Mesas Including Raton Pass; Quay County; South Central Mountains (New Mexico) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Albuquerque (Northern and Central New Mexico)
info.headline: High Wind Watch issued April 10 at 2:33PM MDT until April 12 at 8:00PM MDT by NWS Albuquerque
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 6 PM MDT THIS EVENING... ...HIGH WIND WATCH IN EFFECT FROM TUESDAY MORNING THROUGH TUESDAY EVENING... * WHAT...For the Wind Advisory, west winds 25 to 35 mph with gusts up to 50 mph. For the High Wind Watch, southwest winds 30 to 40 mph with gusts up to 60 mph possible. * WHERE...Central Highlands, South Central Mountains, Guadalupe County, Quay County, Eastern San Miguel County, Harding County and Johnson and Bartlett Mesas Including Raton Pass. * WHEN...For the Wind Advisory, until 6 PM MDT this evening. For the High Wind Watch, from Tuesday morning through Tuesday evening. * IMPACTS...Damaging winds may blow down trees and power lines in some areas. Widespread power outages are expected. Travel will be difficult, especially for high profile vehicles.
info.instruction: Monitor the latest forecasts and warnings for updates.

area.areaDesc: Central Highlands; Eastern San Miguel County; Guadalupe County; Harding County; Johnson and Bartlett Mesas Including Raton Pass; Quay County; South Central Mountains
